metadata.title: CVE-2024-47878 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: OpenRefine is a free, open source tool for working with messy data. Priorto version 3.8.3, the `/extension/gdata/authorized` endpoint includes the`state` GET parameter verbatim in a `<script>` tag in the output, sowithout escaping. An attacker could lead or redirect a user to a craftedURL containing JavaScript code, which would then cause that code to beexecuted in the victim's browser as if it was part of OpenRefine. Version3.8.3 fixes this issue.

criterions.comment: openrefine package in jammy is affected and needs fixing.
